import React ,{useState} from 'react' import {Modal} from 'react-bootstrap' export default function Menu({ items }) { const[ quantity, setquantity]=useState(1) const[ varient, setvarient]=useState(items.varients[0]) const[show,setShow]=useState(false); const handleClose=()=>setShow(false); const handleShow=()=>setShow(true); return (

{items.name}

Varients

Quantity

Price: {items.prices[0][varient]*quantity} Rs/-

Modal title

Modal body text goes here
) }
